oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Joseph Napoleon Bonaparte Lusk and Adaline Davis Lusk
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Marriage portrait of Capt. Joseph Napoleon Bonaparte Lusk, Co. L, 1st Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA and Adaline Davis Lusk. Lusk enlisted in Co. I, 43rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, in November 1861. He deserted, along with his two brothers, in May 1862.; He enlisted in the 7th East Tenn. Inf. Regt., USA, on June 1, 1862 and later the 1st Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. In November 1862 he was appointed 1st Lt. of Co. L., 1st Tenn. Cav. Adaline and Joseph were married in Bradley County, Tennessee, in February 1866.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lusk, Joseph Napoleon Bonaparte;Lusk, Adaline Davis
